body_html: I was also expecting partial_run to work as @basejn used it. Is that in any way possible? I would like to store the tensor of an intermediate graph node and then only run the rest of the graph with that stored tensor so I don't have to rerun the first part of the graph over and over again even though nothing changes.
body_text: I was also expecting partial_run to work as @basejn used it. Is that in any way possible? I would like to store the tensor of an intermediate graph node and then only run the rest of the graph with that stored tensor so I don't have to rerun the first part of the graph over and over again even though nothing changes.
body: I was also expecting ```partial_run``` to work as @basejn used it. Is that in any way possible? I would like to store the tensor of an intermediate graph node and then only run the rest of the graph with that stored tensor so I don't have to rerun the first part of the graph over and over again even though nothing changes.
